text: aur zameen mein muqtaleef tukde ek dosre se lagte lagaate hai aur anguro ke baghaath hai aur khet hai aur khajuro ke daraqt hai shaaq daar aur baaz aise hai jo be shaaq hai, sub ek hee paani pilaaye jaate hai phir bhi hum ek ko ek par phalo mein bartari dete hai, us mein aqal mandho ke liye bahuth si nishaniya hai
